original_text: And over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagerite. All these were the rulers of the substance which was king David's.
korean_text: 다윗 왕의 재산을 맡은 자들이 이러하였더라

sentences.original_text: And over the flocks was Jaziz the Hagerite.
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 양 떼를 다스리는 자는 하갈 사람 자시스였습니다.

sentences.original_text: All these were rulers of the substance
sentences.korean_translation: 이 모든 사람들은 재산을 다스리는 관리들이었습니다.
